# Ifc2x3EntityMappingInformation.IfcEntity property

Entity name of the IFC occurrences in the IFC2x3 schema (valid IFC2x3 entity name). Filters need to include the type, so that only occurrences belonging to type [`IfcEntityType`](./IfcEntityType.md) are included in the mapping.

```csharp
public string IfcEntity { get; }
```
